Reference

Manipulate sa_item

Functions to manipulate sa_item objects

get_comment()

Extract comments

remove_sa_item() remove_all_sa_item() replace_sa_item() add_new_sa_item()

Manipulate SaItems

replace_series() verif_duplicates() verif_ws_duplicates()

Function to automate the replacement of selected series and their metadata by the same series from another workspace This function allows to update a selection of series. It is the partial version of the update_metadata function, of the rjdworkspace package.

Set the metadata of a SaItem

Set the name of a SaItem

set_spec()

Set the specification of a SaItem

set_ts()

Change the input time series of a SaItem

Update the metadata from a workspace
